SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.event_classes

Class EventAdapter.EventViewHolder

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
com.example.eventlottery.event_classes.EventAdapter.EventViewHolder
Enclosing class:
EventAdapter
static class EventAdapter.EventViewHolder extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
ViewHolder for one event card. Caches view references for performance. Made static to avoid holding reference to outer Adapter class.
